post.description:
This endpoint takes a username or email, and a password, and returns an access token, refresh token, expiry time,
token type, and a sub which is used with the refresh token to get a new access token by calling the refresh
endpoint.

The access token is to be used for all endpoints except for /token and /refresh.

This endpoint takes the sub and a refresh token and returns an access token and refresh token.

The access token is to be used for all endpoints except for /token and /refresh.

get.description:
This endpoint returns all connections within your tenancy.

You can specify the telematics_provider, and it will return only Connections with that provider.

parameters.name: telematics_provider

schema.title: Telematics Provider
schema.description: Name of the telematics provider

parameters.description: Name of the telematics provider

post.description:
This endpoint takes attributes for a new Connection and a tenant_id and creates and returns a new Connection.

The allowed values for integration_name can be found under ProviderEnum.

get.description: This endpoint returns a Connection by ID.

parameters.name: connection_id

schema.title: Connection ID
schema.description: Connection ID of the Connection to be returned

parameters.description: Connection ID of the Connection to be returned

get.description:
This endpoint returns all Devices that have been created by Connections for your Tenancy.

You can specify the telematics_provider, and it will return only Devices with that provider.

The response is paginated, so if the next link is not null, use that link to get the next page of results.

parameters.name: telematics_provider

schema.title: Telematics Provider
schema.description: Name of the telematics provider

parameters.description: Name of the telematics provider

parameters.name: page

schema.title: Page number
schema.description: Page number for pagination (zero-indexed)

parameters.description: Page number for pagination (zero-indexed)

get.description: This endpoint returns a Device by ID.

parameters.name: device_id

schema.title: Device id
schema.description: Device ID of the Device to be returned

parameters.description: Device ID of the Device to be returned

get.description:
This endpoint returns the Positions for a Device.

You can optionally specify parameters for start_time_utc and end_time_utc to filter the results.

You can enable OSM road classification by passing through include_osm_road_classification=true.

The response is paginated, so if the next link is not null, use that link to get the next page of results.

parameters.name: device_id

schema.title: Device ID
schema.description: Device ID of the Positions to be returned

parameters.description: Device ID of the Positions to be returned

parameters.name: start_time_utc

schema.title: Start time
schema.description: Start time from when the data will be returned. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss

parameters.description: Start time from when the data will be returned. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss

parameters.name: end_time_utc

schema.title: End time
schema.description: End time from when the data will be returned. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss

parameters.description: End time from when the data will be returned. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss

parameters.name: include_osm_road_classification

schema.title: Include OpenStreetMap road classification
schema.description: Return road name and distance from the road centreline for points which lie on a road. Values are null if the point is not on a road.

parameters.description: Return road name and distance from the road centreline for points which lie on a road. Values are null if the point is not on a road.

parameters.name: page

schema.title: Page number
schema.description: Page number for pagination (zero-indexed)

parameters.description: Page number for pagination (zero-indexed)

get.description:
This endpoint returns the Positions for a Trip.

You can enable OSM road classification by passing through include_osm_road_classification=true.

The response is paginated, so if the next link is not null, use that link to get the next page of results.

schema.title: Trip ID
schema.description: Trip ID of the Positions to be returned

parameters.description: Page number for pagination (zero-indexed)

parameters.name: include_osm_road_classification

schema.title: Include OpenStreetMap road classification
schema.description: Return road name and distance from the road centreline for points which lie on a road. Values are null if the point is not on a road.

parameters.description: Return road name and distance from the road centreline for points which lie on a road. Values are null if the point is not on a road.

get.description:
This endpoint returns the Events for a Device.

You can optionally specify parameters for event_type, start_time_utc and end_time_utc to filter the results.

The response is paginated, so if the next link is not null, use that link to get the next page of results.

post.description: This endpoint takes a list of device_ids and returns the most recent Position of each Device.

get.description: This endpoint return an authenticated url for a websocket connection.

sub.title: Sub
sub.description: The sub (subject) field returned in the login response.
